titleStmt.title: God the protector of Israel a commemoration sermon, for our gracious deliverance, from that monster of treacheries, the gunpowder treason : preached on Friday the fifth of November, at the parish church of S. Leonards Foster-lane, anno domini, 1641 / by H.M.
titleStmt.author: Miller, Henry, fl. 1641.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.N. for Thomas Warren ...,
